# `useResetPassword()`

If a user loses their password, we can resend them an email to authenticate so that they can change it to a new one

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">options</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> `RefOrValue<undefined | ResetPasswordOptions>`

---
